idea-plugin.name: Fuzzier
idea-plugin.description: A fuzzy file finder modeled after telescope for nvim. Designed to be completely usable through the keyboard.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.20.0

Rewrite score calculation

The score calculation has been upgraded and made more transparent. This can be clearly seen in the test bench, where you can now see each individual score for each file.

A bunch of cleaning up and tweaks here and there were made along with the big changes.

Multi match correction

Now correctly calculates each occurrence of unique search string characters in the filepath.

Filename match weight

A new match weight has been added, which only affects the filename.

It calculates the score based on the longest streak of characters that match the filename.
